summary: The sprint planning architect explained an API error (404) preventing the addition of US-016 story due to a backend issue, proposed manual addition via UI or DB or proceeding without it to maintain momentum on SP-001, and provided a detailed draft for US-016 while suggesting to deprecate DEV-001.

decisions.title: Proceed with manual addition or skip US-016 for now
decisions.details: Options presented to handle the API failure: manually add US-016 using the provided draft or focus on existing stories (US-010, US-015, US-001) and add US-016 later.

actions.task: Decide whether to retry API call, manually add US-016, or approve SP-001 without it
Update DEV-001 status to 'Deprecated' once US-016 is added

backlog_deltas.title: Set status to 'Deprecated' and note 'Replaced by US-016'

risks.risk: API endpoint /add-story not responding (404 error), potentially due to local server issue
risks.mitigation: Use manual addition via Backlog UI or direct DB insert; alternatively, proceed without the story to avoid blocking sprint planning
